name: Outro
_source: s;Roland;Lady Morrissey, I cannot thank you enough.{w}{br}I would've been a dead man had you not intervened.{w}{br}But at the risk of sounding ungrateful, why save me?

s;Anuki;"There's no reason to use force when diplomacy would suffice."{w}{br}Father drilled this into my head since I was young.{w}{br}I don't know if Edric was acting alone or if father has abandoned his principles.{w}{br}But Simon and I couldn't stand by and watch the assault.
s;Roland;Very admirable of you.{w} I never expected to see lords behaving selflessly, especially in times like this.

s;Simon;I can see a bit of myself in you, Lord Roland.{w} My lands were taken from me too.{w} I understand the desire to retake them.{w}{br}I'd recommend ceding Morrissey's land,{w} but we can help you retake land in Vesner's old territory.{w}{br}We're working to restore order to the land, and hopefully this will allow you to reclaim some of your home.

s;Roland;You speak with the wisdom of someone twice your age, young lord.{w}{br}And I support your aims wholeheartedly.{w}{br}I'm sure this is a pittance to you, but I hope it can help to some degree in your journey.
s;Roland;Now excuse me.{w} This whole ordeal has certainly shaken me.{w}{br}I... need to lie down for awhile.{w}{br}But you both are welcome back anytime.
s;Anuki;He has a lot of explaining to do.
s;Anuki;Why'd you order Edric to kill Lord Roland?
s;Morrissey;Kill Roland?{w} Where did you hear this?{w}{br}I sent Edric to speak with Roland and ask for our land back.{w}{br}He should be returning from negotiations soon.
s;Anuki;Uh, I think he clearly planned to kill Roland.{w} He brought a small army with him and seemed very eager to attack.
s;Morrissey;Surely not...{w} What makes you say this with such confidence?
s;Anuki;We were there.{w} And before you go reprimanding us, you still have some explaining to do.

s;Morrissey;Ah, I see.{w} Well, you would know better about this than I would.{w}{br}All I can tell you is that I ordered Edric to negotiate with Roland,{w} same as we've done in the past.{w}{br}I didn't feel the need to stress a nonviolent approach, because I felt that went without saying.{w}{br}We've never had issues before.

s;Morrissey;But I suppose Edric's ambition may have gotten the better of him.{w}{br}He's always been a skilled tactician.{w}{br}But perhaps he wanted further dominance than negotiations would have allowed.{w}{br}Damn! I should have been more wary of him.{w}{br}This is nothing short of a disaster.
s;Anuki;So you want us to believe that you had no part in this at all.

s;Morrissey;You can blame me if you like, but I can assure you that I have nothing to gain from Roland's death.{w}{br}I certainly failed by letting Edric's ambition run rampant.{w} But I am no murderer.
s;Anuki;I'm honestly not sure anymore.{w}{br}But he's always been one to favor diplomacy over violence.{w} So I suppose I'll trust him for now.{w} I just hope I'm not being tricked here.
s;Anuki;Thanks for your help with all of this.{w}{br}You're very easy to rely on.{w}{br}Just don't let it go to your head.
